translations: n．失望，沮丧（复数）：未达到期望或愿望的事物，导致心情沮丧。

sentences.sentence: Surely, there will be setbacks and disappointments in life.
sentences.translation: 当然，生活中会有挫折和失望。

sentences.sentence: Like the majority of authors, he had to suffer many disappointments and rejections along the way, but these made him all the more determined to succeed.
sentences.translation: 和大多数作家一样，他在写作过程中经历过许多失望，遭受过许多拒绝，但这些都使他更加下定决心要取得成功。

sentences.sentence: What have been your biggest disappointments or challenges so far?
sentences.translation: 目前为止，最让你失望的事或最大的挑战是什么？
